trans-unit.source: Execution Unit Page

seg-source.mrk: Execution Unit Page

trans-unit.source: Execution Units are managed in the Execution Unit page. This page is opened from the Execution Units page, which is accessible from the Job Card, Jobs list or the BoQ Position List by clicking Navigate > Execution Units.

seg-source.mrk: Execution Units are managed in the Execution Unit page.
This page is opened from the Execution Units page, which is accessible from the Job Card, Jobs list or the BoQ Position List by clicking Navigate > Execution Units.

trans-unit.source: : Execution Units list page

seg-source.mrk: : Execution Units list page

trans-unit.source: The Execution Units page displays all Execution Units that have been assigned to a job, along with some overview information.

seg-source.mrk: The Execution Units page displays all Execution Units that have been assigned to a job, along with some overview information.

trans-unit.source: Click New or Edit to create or open an Execution Unit.

seg-source.mrk: Click New or Edit to create or open an Execution Unit.

trans-unit.source: : Execution Unit page

seg-source.mrk: : Execution Unit page

trans-unit.source: The fields and actions on the Execution Unit page are described in this topic.

seg-source.mrk: The fields and actions on the Execution Unit page are described in this topic.

trans-unit.source: General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: General FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Job No.

seg-source.mrk: Job No.

trans-unit.source: Automatically populated with the associated job number.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically populated with the associated job number.

trans-unit.source: Code

seg-source.mrk: Code

trans-unit.source: User-defined, unique code for the Execution Unit.

seg-source.mrk: User-defined, unique code for the Execution Unit.

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of Execution Unit. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the type of Execution Unit.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Placing Unit – vendor requests created during the calculation phase, or later for processing the subcontractor purchase order.

seg-source.mrk: Placing Unit – vendor requests created during the calculation phase, or later for processing the subcontractor purchase order.

trans-unit.source: Work Package – to-dos to be processed internally, work done by different departments.

seg-source.mrk: Work Package – to-dos to be processed internally, work done by different departments.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Brief description of the Execution Unit.

seg-source.mrk: Brief description of the Execution Unit.

trans-unit.source: Cost Type

seg-source.mrk: Cost Type

trans-unit.source: Identifies the cost type that is considered in the Execution Unit. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the cost type that is considered in the Execution Unit.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: <blank> – all components are considered

seg-source.mrk: <blank> – all components are considered

trans-unit.source: Wage – only wage components are considered

seg-source.mrk: Wage – only wage components are considered

trans-unit.source: Material – only material components are considered

seg-source.mrk: Material – only material components are considered

trans-unit.source: External Service – only external service components are considered

seg-source.mrk: External Service – only external service components are considered

trans-unit.source: Equipment – only equipment components are considered

seg-source.mrk: Equipment – only equipment components are considered

trans-unit.source: Other – only other components are considered

seg-source.mrk: Other – only other components are considered

trans-unit.source: Only relevant for Type = Placing Unit.

seg-source.mrk: Only relevant for Type = Placing Unit.

trans-unit.source: Status

seg-source.mrk: Status

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current status of the Execution Unit. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the current status of the Execution Unit.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Open – Execution Units with this status can be modified can be modified.

seg-source.mrk: Open – Execution Units with this status can be modified can be modified.

trans-unit.source: Released – Execution Units with this status can be used in the procurement process.

seg-source.mrk: Released – Execution Units with this status can be used in the procurement process.

trans-unit.source: Completed – Execution Units with this status cannot be edited or used in the procurement process.

seg-source.mrk: Completed – Execution Units with this status cannot be edited or used in the procurement process.

trans-unit.source: Purchase Quote Manager

seg-source.mrk: Purchase Quote Manager

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the integrated cc|purchase quotes manager (PQM) was used for selecting a subcontractor based on quoted costs.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates whether the integrated cc|purchase quotes manager (PQM) was used for selecting a subcontractor based on quoted costs.

trans-unit.source: Only relevant for Type = Placing Unit.

seg-source.mrk: Only relevant for Type = Placing Unit.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic for more information about using the PQM with Execution Units.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic for more information about using the PQM with Execution Units.

trans-unit.source: Assigned PaC Job No.

seg-source.mrk: Assigned PaC Job No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the PaC job number to which this execution unit has been assigned when preparing to start the procurement process.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the PaC job number to which this execution unit has been assigned when preparing to start the procurement process.

trans-unit.source: Lines FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Lines FastTab

trans-unit.source: The Lines FastTab is populated from the BoQ Position List. Therefore, only the fields that are specific to the Execution Units are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Lines FastTab is populated from the BoQ Position List.
Therefore, only the fields that are specific to the Execution Units are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Assigned Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Assigned Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the complete quantity that has been assigned. When the Quantity field is changed, the Assigned Quantity is updated.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the complete quantity that has been assigned.
When the Quantity field is changed, the Assigned Quantity is updated.

trans-unit.source: The field is formatted as italicized red when the assigned quantity is greater than the available quantity, and bold green when the assigned quantity matches the quantity.

seg-source.mrk: The field is formatted as italicized red when the assigned quantity is greater than the available quantity, and bold green when the assigned quantity matches the quantity.

trans-unit.source: Direct Unit Cost

seg-source.mrk: Direct Unit Cost

trans-unit.source: Displays the Direct Unit Cost in foreign currency.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Direct Unit Cost in foreign currency.

trans-unit.source: Purchase Line Amount

seg-source.mrk: Purchase Line Amount

trans-unit.source: Displays the Purchase Line Amount in foreign currency.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Purchase Line Amount in foreign currency.

trans-unit.source: Unit Price (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Unit Price (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Displays the Unit Price in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Unit Price in local currency.

trans-unit.source: Sales Line Amount (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Sales Line Amount (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Displays the Sales Line Amount in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Sales Line Amount in local currency.

trans-unit.source: Orig. Unit of Measure Code / Original Quantity / Original Sales Line Amount (LCY) / Original Total Cost (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Orig.
Unit of Measure Code / Original Quantity / Original Sales Line Amount (LCY) / Original Total Cost (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Original values from the BoQ Budget Calculation. These fields provide a comparison between what was calculated, planned, and allocated to the PaC job.

seg-source.mrk: Original values from the BoQ Budget Calculation.
These fields provide a comparison between what was calculated, planned, and allocated to the PaC job.

trans-unit.source: Proc. Currency Factor

seg-source.mrk: Proc.
Currency Factor

trans-unit.source: Displays the exchange factor between local currency and foreign currency, which is selected in the Purch. Currency Code field.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the exchange factor between local currency and foreign currency, which is selected in the <span class="Bold">Purch.
Currency Code field.

trans-unit.source: Purch. Currency Code

seg-source.mrk: Purch.
Currency Code

trans-unit.source: Displays the purchase currency, which is defaulted from the BoQ Budget Calculation. When the Currency Code is changed, the value in the Proc. Currency Factor field is updated.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the purchase currency, which is defaulted from the BoQ Budget Calculation.
When the Currency Code is changed, the value in the <span class="Bold">Proc.
Currency Factor field is updated.

trans-unit.source: Direct Unit Cost (LCY) / Total Cost (LCY) / Total Direct Cost (LCY) / Unit Cost (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: Direct Unit Cost (LCY) / Total Cost (LCY) / Total Direct Cost (LCY) / Unit Cost (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Cost values in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Cost values in local currency.

trans-unit.source: The sorting of the lines can be refreshed by clicking Functions > Refresh Sorting on the Lines FastTab. This can be useful when additional positions that should apply between existing lines are added afterwards.

seg-source.mrk: The sorting of the lines can be refreshed by clicking Functions > Refresh Sorting on the Lines FastTab.
This can be useful when additional positions that should apply between existing lines are added afterwards.

trans-unit.source: Procurement FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Procurement FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Procurement FastTab are used for setting defaults for procurement processing. Typically these fields are set when the Execution Unit Type is set to Placing Unit.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the Procurement FastTab are used for setting defaults for procurement processing.
Typically these fields are set when the Execution Unit Type is set to Placing Unit.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Controlling FastTab provide current and budgeted cost/sales information based on the Execution Unit lines.

trans-unit.source: Actions Tab

seg-source.mrk: Actions Tab

trans-unit.source: The functions on the Actions tab are described in the following table. These functions are available on the Home tab.

These functions are available on the Home tab.

trans-unit.source: Action

seg-source.mrk: Action

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Release

seg-source.mrk: Release

trans-unit.source: Sets the Status to Released.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the Status to Released.

trans-unit.source: Reopen

seg-source.mrk: Reopen

trans-unit.source: Sets the Status to Open from a released Execution Unit, or to Release from a finished Execution Unit.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the Status to Open from a released Execution Unit, or to Release from a finished Execution Unit.

trans-unit.source: Finish

seg-source.mrk: Finish

trans-unit.source: Sets the Status to Completed.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the Status to Completed.

trans-unit.source: Update Controlling Values

seg-source.mrk: Update Controlling Values

trans-unit.source: Updates the values in the fields on the Controlling FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Updates the values in the fields on the Controlling FastTab.
